meanings.definition: A person who pays to receive or access a service or publication regularly.
meanings.sent1: The subscriber enjoys reading the newspaper every morning.
meanings.sent2: The online streaming service has millions of subscribers worldwide.
meanings.sent3: The subscriber was so dedicated to the magazine, they read it cover to cover in one sitting.
meanings.sent4: She was a loyal subscriber to the idea of daily exercise, never missing a day.
meanings.sent5: The subscriber's commitment to the monthly book club was unwavering.

meanings.definition: A person who signs or agrees to support or participate in something.
meanings.sent1: As a subscriber to the petition, he hoped to make a difference in his community.
meanings.sent2: The event organizers were thrilled to see so many subscribers to their cause.
meanings.sent3: The subscriber to the charity event ended up winning the raffle prize.
meanings.sent4: She became a subscriber to the new political movement, eager to see change.
meanings.sent5: The subscriber's signature on the agreement sealed the deal for the project.
